title: Court issues arrest warrants against PTI activists over non-appearance
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 08 (APP):An Anti-Terrorism Court (ATC) on Tuesday issued arrest warrants against two PTI activists over non-appearance in a case pertaining violent protest of November 26.
ATC Judge Tahir Abbas Sapra heard the case. During the hearing, lawyers Murtaza Hussain Turi, Aamna Ali, Zahid Bashir Dar and other lawyers appeared in the court.
The court ordered issuance of arrest warrants for two accused who were continuously absent, directed all the accused to ensure their presence at the next hearing and said that copies of the challans will be distributed in the next hearing of the case.
The court adjourned the further hearing of the case till July 15. It should be noted that Bushra Bibi and other PTI leaders are named in the aforementioned case registered at Kohsar police station. So far, challans have been presented in the court to the extent of the workers.
